Message 652 of 4024
It’s funny... I am trying to find a blue/green one to make a set for a little shelf decoration. If you have one, please let me know.
Otherwise these are super expensive. Wow. That said I am impressed you can find the perfect gift by “shopping for” recommendations.
Check it out! You can send one that says to the other person that you are just thinking of them so they think of you. Or even that you love them.
I just thought they were glasses or candle holders. They are actually not. They are deep and meaningful gifts to illicit mutual feelings. Awesome!
BTW- the sexy Cum Together rocker with the message of enhancing someone’s flavor, over time, is sold out. Tell KO to hold on to that one!
Hmmm... I was saying that because he can sell on eBay for more. But he won’t sell those. They were a gift from his dirty married secret.
It’s funny because you saw how much your gift of Cabo glasses meant to me. No inscription, 20% of the price. He’s lucky by comparison to me.
But it is what it is. I was just your soulmate of 30 years. Father of all three of your children, even taking one on that you made without me.
KO is your secret. The secret worth trashing the Moyer family for. I get why you don’t want to talk to the kids.

I think we have been clear on all counts what we need to do next. Please don’t play your games on OFW like you give a crap about anything I say. It’s
fake, insincere, and insulting. You make every decision as if I am not a parent at all. I get you are just trying to F with me to show your lawyer but we
have documented discussions where I have made my asks clear on these topics- SAAS, therapist, Dr. Brown. When you have time to discuss the well
being of our children instead of playing the documentation game let me know. We can wrap this up.
I don’t get you and actually think something is wrong with you mentally. Friday and again yesterday we killed it. Made a ton of progress working
together. But by the time you hit the bridge you brought it to a screaming halt. And now you start this BS on OFW with an email “last call “ blast. I
really do think you will find any reason to screw with me and use the kids as pawns in your glorious, narcissistic grand plan.
Let me know when you want to quit playing again. Because this is a waste of time and you know it.

So.... To confirm, as I called you out (like I am off to do when you don’t tell the truth on critical matters of our family’s destruction) you can NOT
stand by your assertion below? You always have a reason, or explanation when we know you are being dishonest.
With Yurushka it was, “we are not doing that” till I showed you a digital footprint that what I was saying was true and you were being dishonest.
Then your story evolved’ let’s say to accommodate the truth; and you said your dishonesty was actually justified.
I can go on.. KO,  Xmas, vacations, telling our close friends I’m an abuser. Honestly (if you know what that means) if we just start being truthful it
will save us about 80% of the time we waste talking to each other.
Let’s just do that!
- Start being honest with me
- Don’t say things you can’t prove
- Stick to the truth and move forward
Then there is zero need to hang up like you do every time I call BS on your fake reality. No need to record or have someone eavesdrop either. Let’s do
it!

today.

I finally got in
Christ... I’m reading what you wrote. Christine. Please don’t blow up. What on earth did I do? I agreed with everything you asked below. We also
agreed (and chatted once already) that Dr Brown for AD is important enough to address today. It’s the way we started this thread.
And the only question I had, I specifically said I would “pause” not fight. Not escalate. Pause. What else can I do to not be confrontational with you
other than to ask to stop that discussion if it made you mad or we just disagreed. That’s what pause means. Literally.
Why are you escalating, making threats, and refusing what you have already agreed is an urgent enough issue to talk immediately. I said I would pause
Christine. I did not escalate or do anything that should cause you to feel unsafe.
Please re-read what I said. I don’t want to fight. Why are you escalating when I asked to stop the discussion and work on the most immediate plan? I
really don’t get how asking you to stop a discussion we have a different pov on is worth an escalation.
Why are you doing this?
